entries.name: Light Blow
entries.effect: Deals damage directly to the target.

entries.name: Heavy Blow
entries.effect: Deals double damage directly to the target.

entries.name: Strike
entries.effect: Delivers a solid hit to a single target.

entries.name: Precise Strike
entries.effect: Deals increased damage to a single target.

entries.name: Shot
entries.effect: Fires a ranged projectile at a single target.

entries.name: Power Shot
entries.effect: Fires a heavy ranged projectile at a single target.

entries.name: Aimed Shot
entries.effect: Fires a precise ranged projectile at a single target, double its chance of hitting, but dealing half damage.

entries.name: Blast
entries.effect: Unleashes elemental or magical damage at range.

entries.name: Damage Over Time
entries.effect: Inflicts damage that persists for several rounds.

entries.name: Cleave
entries.effect: Damages up to two adjacent targets in a melee arc.

entries.name: Sweep
entries.effect: Damages enemies adjacent to the user.

entries.name: Cone Attack
entries.effect: Damages enemies in a frontal cone.

entries.name: Line Attack
entries.effect: Damages enemies in a straight line.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries.effect: Instantly damages all enemies in a radius.

entries.name: Ground Effect
entries.effect: Creates a lasting damaging zone on the ground.

entries.name: Chain Attack
entries.effect: Jumps between targets, dealing reduced damage.

entries.name: Volley
entries.effect: Fires multiple projectiles into an area.

entries.name: Slow
entries.effect: Reduces movement speed.

entries.name: Root
entries.effect: Immobilizes the target in place.

entries.name: Knockback
entries.effect: Pushes the target back and disrupts movement.

entries.name: Pull
entries.effect: Yanks a target toward the user.

entries.name: Heal
entries.effect: Restores health to a target.

entries.name: Heal Over Time
entries.effect: Gradually restores health over time.

entries.name: Chain Heal
entries.effect: Restores health to nearby allies.

entries.name: Area Heal
entries.effect: Jumps between targets, dealing reduced healing to allies.

entries.name: Shield
entries.effect: Grants a protective barrier or damage reduction.

entries.name: Haste
entries.effect: Increases speed or action frequency through advantage to rolls.

entries.name: Fortify
entries.effect: Raises defenses or maximum health temporarily.

entries.name: Empower
entries.effect: Increases damage, critical chance, or potency.

entries.name: Stealth
entries.effect: Conceals or reduces chance to be targeted.

entries.name: Cleanse
entries.effect: Removes harmful effects from an ally.

entries.name: Stun
entries.effect: Prevents actions for a short time.

entries.name: Silence
entries.effect: Prevents spellcasting or abilities.

entries.name: Fear
entries.effect: Forces the target to flee or lose control.

entries.name: Curse
entries.effect: Afflicts the target with a harmful lingering effect or disadvantage to rolls.

entries.name: Poison/Disease
entries.effect: Inflicts sickness that weakens and harms.

entries.name: Weaken
entries.effect: Reduces damage dealt or increases damage taken.

entries.name: Disarm
entries.effect: Prevents the target from using weapon attacks.

entries.name: Teleport
entries.effect: Instantly relocates the user.

entries.name: Portal/Rift
entries.effect: Opens a gateway between locations.

entries.name: Summon
entries.effect: Brings allies or entities onto the field.

entries.name: Interrupt
entries.effect: Interrupts a spell or channeled ability.

entries.name: Conceal
entries.effect: Conceal through means of magic or mechanism.

entries.name: Reveal Hidden
entries.effect: Reveals hidden or invisible units briefly.

entries.name: Scry
entries.effect: View events or sense objects and people across long distances.

entries.name: Divine
entries.effect: Visions or predictions of potential future outcomes.

entries.name: Possession
entries.effect: Enforces control over another being's actions and thoughts.

entries.name: Dash
entries.effect: Quickly move a short distance without teleporting.
